body_html: @carpodaster yeah that's a good point.. but typing “Woman” works (as we have “Cisgender Woman“ and “Transgender Woman” as options), so it's not really an issue of how the autocomplete works, more a problem of the original list I made. We could definitely add the option “Female” maybe? wdyt @ramonh?
